product_name: NRS Imperial 6 Inflatable Stand Up Paddle Board - 10' 6"
long_description: Ideal for fitness paddling, touring, and light river running, the Imperial 4 offers more volume for larger paddlers yet still compacts small for carrying on your back, in the car or on an airplane.
